comments.comments_text: The corner from Fabian Ruiz (Napoli) is hurriedly cleared.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is hurriedly cleared.

comments.comments_text: Allan (Napoli) gives the referee no choice but to show him a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) gives the referee no choice but to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Nenad Krsticic (Crvena zvezda) has to be very careful for the rest of the match after receiving a yellow card from the referee for a bad tackle on an opponent.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) has to be very careful for the rest of the match after receiving a yellow card from the referee for a bad tackle on an opponent.

comments.comments_text: Marko Marin (Crvena zvezda) fails to produce a decent cross from the corner kick. The ball goes well out of play. The ball goes out of play and Napoli will have a goal kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) fails to produce a decent cross from the corner kick. The ball goes well out of play. The ball goes out of play and [TEAM] will have a goal kick.

comments.comments_text: Marko Marin (Crvena zvezda) decides to speed play up with a short corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) decides to speed play up with a short corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Jose Callejon (Napoli) swings in the corner kick, but one of the defenders leaps highest to head the ball away. Napoli have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) swings in the corner kick, but one of the defenders leaps highest to head the ball away. [TEAM] have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: Mario Rui (Napoli) sends a wonderful cross from the corner kick. However, the defence works perfectly to clear the ball and avert the threat.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) sends a wonderful cross from the corner kick. However, the defence works perfectly to clear the ball and avert the threat.

comments.comments_text: Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) launches an inaccurate corner kick into the penalty area.

comments.comments_text: The whistle is blown for an infringement and Milos Degenek (Crvena zvezda) receives a yellow card!

comments.comments_text: Substitution. Branko Jovicic makes way for Dusan Jovancic (Crvena zvezda).

comments.comments_text: The game is interrupted. Raul Albiol (Napoli) is given a yellow card. He has to be more careful now.

comments.comments_text: FK Crvena zvezda work the corner short. The ball is passed to a nearby teammate.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: FK [TEAM] work the corner short. The ball is passed to a nearby teammate.

comments.comments_text: Marko Marin (Crvena zvezda) takes the corner kick and sends a lovely ball into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready and knocks the ball to safety. The referee blows his whistle, Crvena zvezda are awarded a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: A dangerous looking corner kick from El Fardou Ben (Crvena zvezda) is cleared to safety by the defence.

comments.comments_text: That will be all from Allan who is being replaced by the fresh legs of Dries Mertens (Napoli).
